name: qr-albums-monorepo
description: QR Albums - Production monorepo for album management and media sharing

scripts.sync:android: cd frontend/mobile && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:ios: cd frontend/mobile && npx cap sync ios
scripts.open:android: cd frontend/mobile && npx cap open android
scripts.open:ios: cd frontend/mobile && npx cap open ios
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend/api && dotnet ef migrations add
scripts.db:update: cd backend/api && dotnet ef database update
